text: "Shiny Happy People" is a 1991 song by alternative rock band R.E.M. and is the second single from their seventh studio album Out of Time. It went to the top ten in the United Kingdom, the United States, Ireland, Belgium, Canada, France, Germany, the Netherlands and Norway. It features the voice of The B-52's singer Kate Pierson. ==Track listings== All songs were written by Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills, and Michael Stipe unless otherwise stated.
